Have anyone seen this error before? 

I used to have a very stable configur=
ation that I can run for at 
least a couple weeks but now I'm testing out t=
he new configuration 
(2 dual-core AMDs with 2.6.9 kernel and 32bit java 1.=
5.0_06 server 
VM).

I hit another hotspot error the other day for (maybe) =
completely 
different reasons. I still have a few things to try but want to=
 know 
if anybody is having problem running sizable crawls on 1.5.0_06 and =

2.6.9 kernel.

cheers,
-joe

Here are more detail. Email me if you want mr=
